name: HealthcareAgentOrProxyChoices
title: Healthcare Agent or Proxy Choices
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set identifies the healthcare agent or proxy roles that individuals commonly designate to empower surrogates to make medical treatment and care decisions when the individual is unable to effectively communicate with medical personnel or requires assistance with decision making.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this value set is to identify the questions used to determine an individual's choices for a healthcare agent or proxy, including the designation of surrogates.),(Inclusion Criteria: The value set is defined by this list of concepts.),(Exclusion Criteria: n/a)
